content: who said that the sphere should be the first basic shape why not a cube this pattern is a prime example why a cube can be the cutest basic shape to use these ocean friends are so easy and quick to make while being adorably cute if you enjoy my free patterns and would like to support me to continue making them feel free to buy me a ball of yarn or a cup of coffee by following the link 1 if you cannot don t worry i will still do my best to create free patterns all the same subscribe 2 to my blog 3 to get updates every time i publish a new pattern or tutorial you can also follow me on instagram 4 to watch the daily adventures of my critters please use #craftybunnybun 5 to tag your work i create these patterns because i enjoy seeing your recreations of them 1 https //ko-fi com/t6t4o289 2 https //www craftybunnybun com/subscribe-to-craftybunnybun 3 https //www craftybunnybun com/ 4 https //www instagram com/craftybunnybun/ 5 https //www instagram com/explore/tags/craftybunnybun/
